data.message: I can't seem to upload videos or go live due to I am mistakenly block i need you guys to rectify this

replies.message: Hey Kelvin. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2bpMqVB. -Jessica

This keeps happening and nun of my videos are explicit or indecent photo needs to protect users like myself cause this is part of my job bringing laughter to the world but some hater keeps reporting me and having me block without investigation so please facebook
